algorithm_technique: Mathematical derivation to find crash time and remaining memory using arithmetic series formulas.
problem_summary_simple: Simulate memory allocation until a crash, returning crash time and remaining memory.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate memory allocation with increasing consumption, using arithmetic series formulas to optimize calculation of memory used and crash time.
key_insights: The problem can be solved mathematically by analyzing the memory consumption as an arithmetic progression.
The core idea is to find the point where the cumulative memory allocation exceeds available memory.
Formulas for sum of arithmetic series are crucial for an O(1) solution.
